name: Super Mario: Call of Cthulhu
overview: This is a Rom Hack you shouldn't want to play late at night! Mario finds himself in a very...peculiar world. He will have to fight his way in 6 different and quite creative levels that take all you know about Super Mario World and give it a new twist. Don't forget to get all the tokens before meeting Cthulhu...you will see why! Note: Be sure to use save states.
